attributes.action: Allow unvaccinated or recovered from Covid to travel to Amber list countries
attributes.additional_details:
Please allow international travel for all with the right testing methods without quarantine on return to Amber countries.
Do not discriminate against UK residents who are not currently vaccinated as the EU have shown that travel can be done right for all people.
attributes.background: The Government should take a look at the EU who are allowing travel without quarantine for people who are vaccinated, unvaccinated with tests and who have recovered from COVID.
